messages.subject: Age appropriateness
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 9/7/01 2:50:24 PM US Mountain Standard Time, ... Thanks Sandra..... You re right about that one.  I think I m the one that needs the
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 9/7/01 2:50:24 PM US Mountain Standard Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:


> Too much damage has been done already in the name of "age
> appropriateness."
>

Thanks Sandra..... You're right about that one. I think I'm the one that
needs the deschooling not him (LOL).... I just asked him if he wanted to help
me put a map of the US together (a puzzle) and he said "no mommy I'm going to
play on my computer and learn all about the human body and how it works (It's
a CD I have from DK).... Soon I will stop pushing things on him in the hope
that he'll learn what I think he needs to learn.... But give me a break guys
it's only been 3 days (LOL)

Dawn (enjoying every minute of this new adventure in life)

"The people who get on in this world
are people who get up and look for the
circumstances they want, and,
if they can't find them, make them." - George Bernard Shaw

"The only time my education was interrupted was when I was in school."-George
Bernard Shaw
